about.title: Our Commitment to Sustainability
about.content: At Gleaftex, we blend traditional Thai wisdom with modern eco-friendly technologies to create textiles that respect both nature and culture. Our fabrics are designed for the tropical Southeast Asian climate while meeting global sustainability standards.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To become Southeast Asia's leading provider of sustainable textiles, harmonizing environmental responsibility with cultural heritage.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: We create eco-friendly textiles that honor Buddhist principles of respect for all living beings while supporting local communities and reducing environmental impact.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.content: Founded in 2015, Gleaftex began as a small workshop in Bangkok, combining traditional Thai textile techniques with modern sustainable practices. Today, we serve clients across the ASEAN region, maintaining our commitment to quality and sustainability.

wholesale.title: Wholesale Inquiries
wholesale.content: Looking for bulk orders? Contact our sales team for competitive wholesale pricing and customized solutions.

asean.intro: Understanding the sustainable textile standards across Southeast Asia.

standards.title: Regional Standards
standards.content: We comply with all ASEAN regional environmental standards for textile production, ensuring our products meet or exceed requirements in all member countries.

logistics.title: Thailand Logistics Solutions
logistics.content: Our Bangkok-based distribution center offers efficient shipping throughout Southeast Asia, with special rates for ASEAN countries.

religious.title: Religious-Friendly Materials
religious.content: Our production processes respect Buddhist principles and provide options suitable for various religious requirements across the region.

caseStudies.title: Local Case Studies
caseStudies.content: Learn how we partnered with Thai Union to develop sustainable uniforms made from recycled ocean plastic.

buddhist.title: Sustainability in Buddhist Culture

principles.title: Buddhist Principles in Production
principles.content: Our manufacturing processes are guided by Buddhist concepts of mindfulness and respect for all living beings, minimizing harm to the environment.

designs.title: Thai Designer Collaborations
designs.content: We work with local Thai designers to create textiles that incorporate traditional Buddhist motifs and patterns using sustainable techniques.
